Files Headings

_baseSortBy.js

The base implementation of _.sortBy which uses comparer to define the sort order of array and replaces criteria objects with their corresponding values.

Params
array Array The array to sort.
comparer Function The function to define sort order. 
function baseSortBy(array, comparer) {
  var length = array.length;

  array.sort(comparer);
  while (length--) {
    array[length] = array[length].value;
  }
  return array;
}

module.exports = baseSortBy;
